quotes.quote: Once you have things you longed for when you couldn't have them, they no longer become important. The important things cannot be achieved monetarily. You want to be able to get up every morning and put on your underpants without holding on to the side of the nightstand.
quotes.author: Judge Judy

quotes.quote: They say a clean cut heals soonest. There’s nothing sadder to me than associations held together by nothing but the glue of postage stamps. If you can’t see or hear or touch a man, it’s best to let him go.
quotes.author: Lee (East of Eden)

quotes.quote: I'll never say anything bad about you before I say it to your face. And I expect the same in return.
quotes.author: SgtMaj Mike Woods

quotes.quote: If you are not appreciated, do not be angry, that means you are in the wrong place. Don't stay in a place where no one sees your value.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.quote: If you want to go fast, go alone; if you want to go far, go together.
quotes.author: African Proverb

quotes.quote: Be the change that you wish to see in the world.
quotes.author: Mahatma Gandhi

quotes.quote: The best way to predict your future is to create it.
quotes.author: Abraham Lincoln

quotes.quote: Believe you can and you're halfway there.
quotes.author: Theodore Roosevelt

quotes.quote: I have not failed. I've just found 10,000 ways that won't work.
quotes.author: Thomas Edison

quotes.quote: If you want to lift yourself up, lift up someone else.
quotes.author: Booker T. Washington

quotes.quote: If you're going through hell, keep going.
quotes.author: Winston Churchill

quotes.quote: It does not matter how slowly you go as long as you do not stop.
quotes.author: Confucius

quotes.quote: Success is not final, failure is not fatal:it is the courage to continue that counts.
quotes.author: Winston Churchill

quotes.quote: The only way to do great work is to love what you do.
quotes.author: Steve Jobs

quotes.quote: The pessimist sees difficulty in every opportunity. The optimist sees opportunity in every difficulty.
quotes.author: Winston Churchill

quotes.quote: You miss 100% of the shots you don't take.
quotes.author: Wayne Gretzky

quotes.quote: Don't watch the clock; do what it does. Keep going.
quotes.author: Sam Levenson

quotes.quote: Everything you've ever wanted is on the other side of fear.
quotes.author: George Addair

quotes.quote: Success is not how high you have climbed, but how you make a positive difference to the world.
quotes.author: Roy T. Bennett

quotes.quote: A person who never made a mistake never tried anything new.
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.quote: The greatest glory in living lies not in never falling, but in rising every time we fall.
quotes.author: Nelson Mandela

quotes.quote: You can't build a reputation on what you are going to do.
quotes.author: Henry Ford

quotes.quote: It's not about how hard you hit. It's about how hard you can get hit and keep moving forward.
quotes.author: Rocky Balboa

quotes.quote: We may encounter many defeats but we must not be defeated.
quotes.author: Maya Angelou

quotes.quote: Either you run the day, or the day runs you.
quotes.author: Jim Rohn

quotes.quote: The best way out is always through.
quotes.author: Robert Frost

quotes.quote: Twenty years from now you will be more disappointed by the things that you didn't do than by the ones you did do.
quotes.author: Mark Twain

quotes.quote: You will hate every minute of your training, don't quit. Suffer now and live rest of your life as a champion.
quotes.author: Mike Tyson

quotes.quote: There are no traffic jams along the extra mile.
quotes.author: Roger Staubach
